remarks: Lemma for ~ summo .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Mar-2014.)
statement:
summo.1 $e |- F = ( k e. ZZ |-> if ( k e. A , B , 0 ) ) $.
summo.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
summo.3 $e |- G = ( n e. NN |-> [_ ( f ` n ) / k ]_ B ) $.
summolem3.4 $e |- H = ( n e. NN |-> [_ ( K ` n ) / k ]_ B ) $.
summolem3.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( M e. NN /\ N e. NN ) ) $.
summolem3.6 $e |- ( ph -> f : ( 1 ... M ) -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
summolem3.7 $e |- ( ph -> K : ( 1 ... N ) -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
summolem3 $p |- ( ph -> ( seq 1 ( + , G ) ` M ) = ( seq 1 ( + , H ) ` N ) ) $.
$d A f k n $.
$d B f n $.
$d F f k n $.
$d G k n $.
$d K k n $.
$d M k n $.
$d N k n $.
$d k n ph $.
